eeta amatharawa, ee ee amathyansha, departhamenthu, wyawasthapitha mandala ha wenath rajya aayathana mangin sanwardhana wadasatahan kriyathmaka karana atharama, jathika handunumpath labaganime sita widesha gaman balapathra, wishrama watup, idam himikam, balapathra, kshudra mulya naya pahasukam, niwasa gatalu, kamkaru gatalu, wadihiti ha samaja subasadhana wani kshethrayanhidi pananangina gataluwalata wisandum labadima sandaha jangama sewawan pawathwimada sidu we.
